turns.ai_line: Doctor, I dey feel serious pain for my belle wey start wen I chop leftover rice. I dey purge and feel like to vomit sef. E be like say di food don spoil because di place wey I dey stay dey humid well well and food dey spoil quick.
Doctor, abeg wetin you go suggest make I do? I no fit continue like dis, di pain too much.
